context_bundle.summary: Envoy: High-performance edge/service proxy. Foundation for Istio, AWS App Mesh. Key features: L4/L7 load balancing, HTTP/2 & gRPC native, hot reload, xDS APIs for dynamic config, extensive observability, circuit breaking, rate limiting, retries.

onboarding.quick_start: Envoy: 1) Create envoy.yaml with static_resources (listeners, clusters), 2) Run: docker run -v ./envoy.yaml:/etc/envoy/envoy.yaml envoyproxy/envoy, 3) For dynamic: implement xDS control plane or use Istio/Consul.
common_patterns: Listener: binds to port, routes to clusters via filter_chains
Cluster: group of upstream hosts with load balancing policy
Route config: match path/headers -> route to cluster

known_errors.cause: Cluster endpoint unreachable or DNS resolution failure
known_errors.solution: Check cluster endpoints, DNS config, network policies
known_errors.prevention: Use health checks, configure appropriate timeouts
